detailsSection: Script is used to identity the work items that needs to be created.
installInstructionSection:
Steps:
1. Download the zip file to your local computer.
2. Unzip the downloaded file.
3. Launch PowerShell and navigate to the directory where the files were extracted. Run the command ".\Fetch-ES365FunSecurityConfig.ps1".
The script will prompt you to authenticate once or twice. Provide the necessary authentication and wait for the script to complete. An output file will be generated, which is needed to be uploaded here.

For additional information on the script, please follow this link: https://aka.ms/Wiki_ES365ConfFetch
